item.title: Dissecting torch.compile: Surgical Precision in PyTorch Optimization
item.description: You can take a look at the GitHub repository of this blogpost at this link Remember when machine learning was done using Caffe? The ML Surgeon remembers that. If you didn’t catch the reference, too bad for you!
